sentences.english: Tiger bone wine has reappeared on the market in China, despite a ban on the trade.
sentences.chinese: 儘管虎骨交易已被禁，虎骨酒又重現在中國的市場上。

sentences.english: Tiger bone wine has reappeared on the market in China, despite a ban on the trade.
sentences.chinese: 儘管虎骨交易已被禁，虎骨酒又重現在中國的市場上。

sentences.english: These took the forms of tiger bone pills, plasters, gels and wine.
sentences.chinese: 這些採取了形式的虎骨丸，膏，膠和葡萄酒。

sentences.english: India seizes third shipment of tiger parts on way to China .
sentences.chinese: 印度捕獲第三隻偷運虎骨至中國的走私船。

sentences.english: Tiger bone wine has re-emerged on the market in China, despite a ban on the trade.
sentences.chinese: 儘管虎骨交易已被禁，虎骨酒又重現在中國的市場上。

sentences.english: Tiger bone wine has re-emerged on the market in China, despite a ban on the trade.
sentences.chinese: 儘管虎骨交易已被禁，虎骨酒又重現在中國的市場上。

sentences.english: They say everything from live baby lions to wine made from tiger bone have been traded online.
sentences.chinese: 他們表示，從獅子幼崽到虎骨酒都在網絡上交易。

sentences.english: The Koreans were among the most enthusiastic purchasers of both the black bear bile and the tiger wine.
sentences.chinese: 韓國人是購買黑熊膽汁和虎骨酒最熱衷的購買者。

sentences.english: Clinical trials of tiger bones' medical efficacy are also under review.
sentences.chinese: 對虎骨醫用療效的臨牀試驗也在評估之中。

sentences.english: Police found tiger bones and skin at Jiang's home on April 1, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 4月1日，民警從江家中搜出虎骨和虎皮。

definition: tokay gecko (Gekko gecko), used in TCM
young deer antler prior to ossification (used in TCM)
Epimedium, genus of herbaceous flowering plant, cultivated in the Far East as aphrodisiac/also called barrenwort or horny goatweed (said to resemble crushed goat's testicles)
golden eye-grass (Curculigo orchioides)/Curculigo rhizome (used in TCM)
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
